name: url-parse
description: Small footprint URL parser that works seamlessly across Node.js and browser environments

scripts.browserify: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s URLParse -o dist/url-parse.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run browserify && npm run minify
